thread.title: Travis Scott Announces "Birds Eye View" Tour
thread.title_full: Travis Scott Announces "Birds Eye View" Tour

author: Trevor Smith
title: Travis Scott Announces "Birds Eye View" Tour
text:
Home > Music > Travis Scott Announces "Birds Eye View" Tour Travis Scott Announces "Birds Eye View" Tour 1 0 Posted by Trevor Smith , Mar 5, 2017 at 04:57pm Travis has shared the poster on Twitter and Instagram. 
Travis Scott has announced the Birds Eye View tour today, sharing a poster on Twitter and Instagram. The tour comes in support of Travis' 2016 album Birds In The Trap Sing McKnight . According to the post, further details will arrive Monday. Monday — TRAVIS SCOTT (@trvisXX) March 5, 2017 
The poster Travis posted on Twitter features the tagline "Please Remain Calm," while the one shared on Instagram reads "Fear The Flock." Could the latter be a reference to opening acts on the tour? A post shared by flame (@travisscott) on Mar 5, 2017 at 1:02pm PST 
Travis has previously played shows across the country with Young Thug on 2015's Rodeo tour . He is currently working on a follow-up to Birds In The Trap Sing McKnight titled Astroworld . Look out for more information on the tour Monday on TravisScott.com . SO READY FOR THIS TOUR TO BUST OPEN. #BIRDSEYEVIEW < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Mar 5, 2017 at 04:57pm 36 Views 
"HNDRXX" has replaced "FUTURE" at the top of the Billboard 200. Travis has shared the poster on Twitter and Instagram.

Travis has previously played shows across the country with Young Thug on 2015's Rodeo tour . He is currently working on a follow-up to Birds In The Trap Sing McKnight titled Astroworld . Look out for more information on the tour Monday on TravisScott.com . SO READY FOR THIS TOUR TO BUST OPEN. #BIRDSEYEVIEW
